scripts.build:windows-x64: bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --bytecode --target=bun-windows-x64-modern --define BUILD_VERSION='"0.1.0"' ./src/app.ts --outfile dist/hcl-to-yaml.exe && cd dist && zip hcl-to-yaml-windows-x64.zip hcl-to-yaml.exe
scripts.build:linux-x64: bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --bytecode --target=bun-linux-x64-modern --define BUILD_VERSION='"0.1.0"' ./src/app.ts --outfile dist/hcl-to-yaml && cd dist && zip hcl-to-yaml-linux-x64.zip hcl-to-yaml
scripts.build:macOS-arm: bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --bytecode --target=bun-darwin-x64 --define BUILD_VERSION='"0.1.0"' ./src/app.ts --outfile dist/hcl-to-yaml.app && cd dist && zip hcl-to-yaml-macos-arm.zip hcl-to-yaml.app
scripts.build:all: bun run build:windows-x64 && bun run build:linux-x64 && bun run build:macOS-arm
